title: Vuelta a España stage 17: Sepp Kuss clings to lead as Vingegaard, Roglič ride away on the Angliru
content:
Vingegaard and Roglič drop Kuss with 2km to go on the legendary climb and the American digs deep to defend the leader's jersey.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 17: Sepp Kuss clings to lead as Vingegaard, Roglič ride away on the Angliru on Velo.
author: ahood
